text.section: Subject to the provisions of this section, the Board may waive any examination requirement of this subtitle for an individual who is licensed to practice land surveying in another state.

The Board may grant a waiver under this section only if the applicant:
is of good character and reputation;
pays to the Board:
the nonrefundable application fee set by the Board under § 15-306 of this subtitle; and
the license fee set by the Board; and
provides adequate evidence that, at the time the applicant was licensed by the other state, the applicant met requirements that were equivalent to those then required by the laws of this State.
